sentences.sContent: Like you, a bit, but smarter, taller and better looking.
sentences.sContent_eng: Like you, a bit, but smarter, taller and better looking.
sentences.sCn: 就像你，有一点点，但是更聪明、更高、更好看。

sentences.sContent: When re-released in January 2010, she will be taller and thinner, but still wearing an outfit similar to her first one.
sentences.sContent_eng: When re-released in January 2010, she will be taller and thinner, but still wearing an outfit similar to her first one.
sentences.sCn: 当在2010年1月重新发布的时候，她会变得更高和更瘦，但仍然会穿着和第一次相似的服饰。
